title: Replace hero images with uploaded photos across pages

requirements.text: Replace the existing landing (AuthGate) hero image with an edited/cropped version of the uploaded photos, keeping the same public path currently used by the app ("/assets/generated/home-hero.dim_1600x600.jpg").

quotes: Add these on the different pages and replace the existing one too

acceptanceCriteria: AuthGate renders the hero image from /assets/generated/home-hero.dim_1600x600.jpg (no broken images)
The previous hero image is no longer shown anywhere the AuthGate hero appears

requirements.text: Replace the default EvangelismPageShell hero image with an edited/cropped version of the uploaded photos, keeping the same public path currently used by the app ("/assets/generated/evangelism-hero.dim_1600x600.png").

quotes: Add these on the different pages and replace the existing one too

acceptanceCriteria: EvangelismPageShell renders the hero image from /assets/generated/evangelism-hero.dim_1600x600.png when showHero={true} and no heroOverride is provided
The previous evangelism hero image is no longer shown anywhere the default evangelism hero appears

requirements.text: Add the third uploaded image as an additional hero image used on at least one non-landing page by creating a new static asset in the public assets folder and wiring it into a page via EvangelismPageShell's heroOverride (e.g., enable showHero on TopicsQuestionsIndexPage and set heroOverride to the new asset).

quotes: Add these on the different pages and replace the existing one too

acceptanceCriteria: At least one additional page (besides AuthGate and the default EvangelismPageShell hero) displays the third uploaded image as a hero image
The new hero asset is served from a stable public path under /assets/generated/ and loads without errors

constraints: Frontend immutablePaths must not be modified (including frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, and frontend/src/components/ui/*).
Do not introduce any new backend canisters/services; keep changes frontend-only.
nonGoals: Changing backend data models or Motoko logic.
Adding new routes or new product features unrelated to placing/replacing the images.

edits: Crop/resize for evangelism default hero (pexels-8moments-1183099.jpg > evangelism-hero.dim_1600x600.png)
Crop/resize for an additional hero image (pexels-arnie-chou-304906-1229042.jpg > topics-hero.dim_1600x600.jpg)
